testCases.name: Functional Application Test
testCases.description: Verify the application has actual functionality beyond basic placeholder
steps: Navigate to application homepage
Verify multiple interactive elements exist (navigation menu, buttons, image gallery)
Check for proper navigation structure with Explore, Featured, Login/Signup links
Verify application shows real image showcase functionality, not just placeholder content
Confirm responsive design and professional appearance
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application displays a functional image showcase platform with navigation, gallery, and interactive elements
testCases.failureCondition: If page only shows basic placeholder content or 'Vite + React' text, this test should FAIL

testCases.name: User Authentication Flow Test
testCases.description: Test complete user registration and login functionality
steps: Navigate to /auth page
Test user registration with email, username, and password
Verify successful registration redirects to authenticated state
Test logout functionality
Test login with registered credentials
Verify authentication state persists across page refreshes
Test protected route access (upload, dashboard, notifications)
testCases.expectedOutcome: Users can successfully register, login, logout, and access protected features
testCases.failureCondition: Authentication fails, protected routes are accessible without login, or session doesn't persist

testCases.name: Image Gallery and Showcase Test
testCases.description: Test image browsing, viewing, and gallery functionality
steps: Navigate to homepage and verify image gallery loads
Test image grid display with proper thumbnails
Click on individual images to view details
Test navigation between different gallery views
Verify image metadata (title, description) displays correctly
Test responsive gallery layout on different screen sizes
testCases.expectedOutcome: Image gallery displays properly with clickable thumbnails, detailed views, and responsive design
testCases.failureCondition: Gallery doesn't load, images don't display, or navigation between views fails

testCases.name: Image Upload Functionality Test
testCases.description: Test image upload feature for authenticated users
steps: Login as authenticated user
Navigate to /upload page
Test file selection for image upload
Fill in image metadata (title, description, tags)
Submit upload form
Verify upload success message
Check that uploaded image appears in gallery
Test upload validation (required fields, file types)
testCases.expectedOutcome: Authenticated users can successfully upload images with metadata
testCases.failureCondition: Upload fails, validation doesn't work, or uploaded images don't appear in gallery

testCases.name: Navigation and Routing Test
testCases.description: Test application navigation and routing functionality
steps: Test all navigation links in top navigation bar
Verify Explore, Featured, Upload, Notifications pages load correctly
Test user dropdown menu functionality
Verify protected routes redirect to login when not authenticated
Test browser back/forward navigation
Verify URL changes match page content
testCases.expectedOutcome: All navigation links work correctly, routing functions properly, and protected routes are secured
testCases.failureCondition: Navigation links broken, routing fails, or protected routes accessible without authentication

testCases.name: Search and Discovery Test
testCases.description: Test image search and filtering capabilities
steps: Navigate to explore page
Test search functionality with various keywords
Verify search results display relevant images
Test category filtering if available
Test sorting options (newest, popular, etc.)
Verify search handles empty results gracefully
testCases.expectedOutcome: Search functionality returns relevant results and filtering works correctly
testCases.failureCondition: Search doesn't work, returns no results, or filtering fails

testCases.name: Social Features Test
testCases.description: Test social interaction features like likes, comments, and follows
steps: Login as authenticated user
Navigate to image detail view
Test like/unlike functionality on images
Test commenting on images
Navigate to user profiles
Test follow/unfollow functionality
Check notifications for social interactions
testCases.expectedOutcome: Social features work correctly with proper feedback and notifications
testCases.failureCondition: Like, comment, or follow features don't work or don't provide feedback

testCases.name: Responsive Design Test
testCases.description: Test application responsiveness across different screen sizes
steps: Test application on desktop viewport (1920x1080)
Test on tablet viewport (768x1024)
Test on mobile viewport (375x667)
Verify navigation menu adapts to smaller screens
Check image gallery layout responsiveness
Test form layouts on different screen sizes
Verify text readability and button accessibility
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application displays properly and remains functional across all screen sizes
testCases.failureCondition: Layout breaks, content becomes unreadable, or functionality is lost on smaller screens

testCases.name: Error Handling and Edge Cases Test
testCases.description: Test application behavior with errors and edge cases
steps: Test login with invalid credentials
Test registration with existing email
Test upload with invalid file types
Test navigation to non-existent pages
Test form submission with missing required fields
Test network error scenarios
Verify appropriate error messages display
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application handles errors gracefully with appropriate user feedback
testCases.failureCondition: Application crashes, shows unclear error messages, or fails to handle edge cases

testCases.name: Performance and Loading Test
testCases.description: Test application loading times and performance
steps: Measure initial page load time
Test image gallery loading with multiple images
Verify loading states and spinners display appropriately
Test smooth transitions between pages
Check for memory leaks during extended use
Verify images load efficiently with proper optimization
testCases.expectedOutcome: Application loads quickly with appropriate loading indicators and smooth performance
testCases.failureCondition: Slow loading times, missing loading states, or performance issues during use
